name: AI SDLC Method Marketplace
description: Complete AI-assisted software development lifecycle with requirement traceability, multi-stage agent orchestration, and homeostatic quality enforcement
author: foolishimp

plugins.name: aisdlc-core
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Core - Requirement Traceability Foundation
plugins.description: Foundation plugin providing requirement traceability with REQ-* key patterns, coverage detection (sensor), and key propagation (actuator). Essential foundation for all AI SDLC plugins.

plugins.name: aisdlc-methodology
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Methodology - Multi-Stage Agent Configuration
plugins.description: Complete AI SDLC methodology with 7-stage agent configurations: Requirements, Design, Tasks, Code (TDD), System Test (BDD), UAT (BDD), Runtime Feedback. Integrates Key Principles and full lifecycle traceability.

plugins.name: principles-key
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Key Principles - Seven Development Principles Enforcement
plugins.description: Enforce the 7 Key Principles during development: TDD, Fail Fast, Modular, Reuse Before Build, Open Source First, No Legacy Baggage, Perfectionist Excellence. Includes Seven Questions Checklist sensor.

plugins.name: requirements-skills
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Requirements Skills - Intent to Structured Requirements
plugins.description: Transform raw intent into structured, traceable requirements with REQ-* keys. Disambiguate into business rules (BR-*), constraints (C-*), and formulas (F-*). Support requirements refinement loop from TDD/BDD discoveries.

plugins.name: design-skills
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Design Skills - Architecture and ADRs with Traceability
plugins.description: Transform requirements into technical solution architecture with REQ-* traceability. Create Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) acknowledging ecosystem E(t). Validate design coverage for all requirements.

plugins.name: code-skills
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Code Skills - TDD, BDD, and Code Generation
plugins.description: Complete code development workflow skills: TDD (RED→GREEN→REFACTOR), BDD (Given/When/Then), code generation from business rules, and tech debt management (Principle #6 enforcement).

plugins.name: testing-skills
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Testing Skills - Coverage Validation and Test Generation
plugins.description: Test coverage validation, missing test detection (sensor), automatic test generation (actuator), integration testing, and coverage reporting with requirement traceability.

plugins.name: runtime-skills
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Runtime Skills - Production Feedback Loop
plugins.description: Close the feedback loop from production to requirements. Tag telemetry with REQ-* keys, setup observability, and trace production issues back to intent. Enables homeostatic production monitoring.

bundles.name: startup-bundle
bundles.description: Quick-start bundle for startups and solo developers. Includes core traceability, TDD workflow, and Key Principles enforcement. Minimal overhead, maximum quality.

bundles.name: datascience-bundle
bundles.description: AI SDLC adapted for data science and ML workflows. Future support for REPL-driven development, notebook-to-module extraction, and property-based testing. Currently includes core foundation.

bundles.name: qa-bundle
bundles.description: Testing-focused bundle for QA teams. Includes BDD scenarios, coverage validation, test generation, and requirements-to-tests traceability. Perfect for test-first development teams.

bundles.name: enterprise-bundle
bundles.description: Complete 7-stage AI SDLC for enterprise teams. Full governance, traceability, compliance, and feedback loop. Includes all core plugins for requirements, design, code, testing, runtime, and principles.

architecture.traceability_flow: Intent → Requirements → Design → Tasks → Code → Tests → Runtime → Feedback Loop
core_patterns: REQ-* key propagation through all stages
Homeostatic sensors detect gaps, actuators fix them
Seven Questions Checklist enforces Key Principles
BDD scenarios validate requirements in business language
